div.head: 大小便滑數
div.div: major and minor relief smooth and frequent; smooth and frequent defecation and urination

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major and minor relief smooth and frequent; smooth and frequent defecation and urination

sense.def: Illness Sign of increased frequency of defecation and urination with their passage being difficult to control. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tian xiong 天雄 quoting HJJF san jian tang 三建 湯：大便滑泄 , “Smooth outflow of stools”, writes: 大小便滑數 , “Smooth and frequent defecation and urination ”.
